pullRequest.title: Test: don't modify defaultConfig on upgrade
pullRequest.bodyText:
Otherwise defaultConfig on bwc tests is the union of all
earlier configurations, which may have conflicting settings.

commit.message: Test: don't modify defaultConfig on upgrade

nodes.bodyText: I'm a bit confused. Is the configuration in defaultConfig not needed? ElasticsearchCluster.commonNodeConfig() places a bunch of stuff in there. Won't this change now no longer write those config items to the config file or am I missing something?
